titleStmt.title: Vnitie, trvth and reason presented in all humility petition-wise to the honourable, the knights, citizens and burgesses, for the Commons House of Parliament / by some moderate, and peace-desiring ministers, for the more happy and certaine reconciling of the church-differences.
titleStmt.author: H. P.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
